Durston Design is a small Interior Design company based out of New Westminster B.C. offering services throughout the Lower Mainland. Principal Designer, Stephanie Durston is known for her attention to detail and a design style that is greatly influenced by combining Mid-Century Modern furniture with clean modern lines and layers of texture. 
"Good design is a process; I rely on my skills, education and the trust of my clients to help turn a concept into a functioning, beautiful space that they will love for years to come. I do not design for myself, I listen to my clients and offer the best design solutions for their specific needs. The result is a home that they love and work that I am proud to stand behind. 
My many years in customer relations, my continuous design training and over 7 years experience focussed on residential spaces, has helped me grow as an Interior Designer. All this paired with my strong work ethic and attention to detail has opened doors for me to work with clients all over the Vancouver area from furniture and lighting specification to full home renovations." Stephanie
